mapper.sql: INFO_ID, ORDERID, NVL(BUYER_SALESMANID,0) AS BUYER_SALESMANID, BUYER_ORGID, BUYER_ORGS, NVL(SELLER_SALESMANID,0) AS SELLER_SALESMANID, SELLER_ORGID, SELLER_ORGS
mapper.insert:
select ZYC.SEQ_BUSI_ORDER_SALESMAN.nextval as INFO_ID from dual
insert into ZYC.BUSI_ORDER_SALESMAN (INFO_ID, ORDERID, BUYER_SALESMANID, BUYER_ORGID, BUYER_ORGS, SELLER_SALESMANID, SELLER_ORGID, SELLER_ORGS) values (#{infoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerSalesmanid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{buyerOrgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{buyerOrgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellerSalesmanid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellerOrgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellerOrgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ZYC.BUSI_ORDER_SALESMAN
INFO_ID, ORDERID, BUYER_SALESMANID, BUYER_ORGID, BUYER_ORGS, SELLER_SALESMANID, SELLER_ORGID, SELLER_ORGS,

mapper.update:
update ZYC.BUSI_ORDER_SALESMAN
ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUYER_SALESMANID = #{buyerSalesmanid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUYER_ORGID = #{buyerOrgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUYER_ORGS = #{buyerOrgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELLER_SALESMANID = #{sellerSalesmanid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SELLER_ORGID = #{sellerOrgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SELLER_ORGS = #{sellerOrgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where INFO_ID = #{infoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ZYC.BUSI_ORDER_SALESMAN set ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUYER_SALESMANID = #{buyerSalesmanid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUYER_ORGID = #{buyerOrgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUYER_ORGS = #{buyerOrgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELLER_SALESMANID = #{sellerSalesmanid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELLER_ORGID = #{sellerOrgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELLER_ORGS = #{sellerOrgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INFO_ID = #{infoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
